title: If there is no data for series, it should pop up a friendly error message to remind.
OB: When there is no data for a series, there is no error message displayed.
EB: If there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a chart and set the data definition.
2. Select a column without any data.
3. Observe that no error message is displayed.
